Our ideal candidate will have strong experience with building automated test suites and running continuous integration systems for web-based applications and APIs. You will also be responsible for developing QA procedures, testing of software and reporting on the quality of the current builds. This role will expose you to all aspects of the software stack and many cutting edge frameworks/tools.
